meanings.definition: A shrub or small tree of the rose family, with white flowers and red or orange berries.
meanings.sent1: The pyracantha in our garden has beautiful white flowers.
meanings.sent2: Birds love to eat the bright red pyracantha berries.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to juggle the pyracantha berries.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks were as red as ripe pyracantha berries.
meanings.sent5: The pyracantha bush stood out in the snow with its vibrant berries.

meanings.definition: The fruit of the pyracantha plant, resembling small apples.
meanings.sent1: I made a delicious jam using pyracantha fruits.
meanings.sent2: The pyracantha fruits added a pop of color to the autumn landscape.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended the pyracantha fruits were tiny magic potions.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the shiny pyracantha fruits.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the pyracantha fruits filled the kitchen with sweetness.
